Bash(~/.claude/contexts/vaporforge-2026-02-10-end.md << 'CTXEOF'
# VaporForge Session End — 2026-02-10

## Summary
Built in-app Issue Tracker + Settings search facets + session bug fixes. All deployed.

## Accomplished
- Issue Tracker: 3 new files \(store, modal, card\), full CRUD, screenshots, drag reorder, filter-aware markdown export, per-issue copy
- Custom themed checkbox \(cyberpunk consistency\)
- Search facets on Commands, Agents, Plugins, MCP Servers settings tabs
- Fixed createSession state leak \(stale messages/files in new tabs\)
- Fixed ghost session restore after all sessions deleted
- Plugin refresh endpoint with mergeItems\(\)

## Commit
3d72ad2 — feat: add issue tracker + settings search + session bug fixes

## Next Steps
1. Fix remaining issues: Pill location \(M\), Sandbox missing features \(M\), Reforge Link \(S\)
2. Subscription billing \(Stripe\)
3. Secrets management \(Worker-secrets route\)
CTXEOF)

Bash(~/.claude/contexts/bricks-cc-2026-02-12-ui-overhaul.md << 'ENDCTX'
# Bricks CC \(WP Dispatch\) — UI/UX Overhaul Session

## Date: 2026-02-12
## Branch: main
## Domain: dispatch.jbcloud.app \(LIVE\)

## Summary
Complete dark teal theme conversion of the entire bricks-cc codebase. Renamed product from "Bricks CC" to "WP Dispatch". Set up custom domain on Vercel.

## What Was Done

### Previous session \(compacted\)
- Redesigned 13 core files from light purple to dark teal theme
- Renamed product to WP Dispatch across all user-facing text
- Fixed NavBar double-rendering, hero button cache issue, stray amber colors
- Themed 5 missed client sub-pages \(feedback, settings, bricks, new client, FeedbackForm\)
- All committed and pushed as 40e56b7

### This session
- Converted remaining 9 files to dark teal theme:
  1. src/utils/formatting.ts — status badge colors
  2. src/app/auth/pin/page.tsx — purple gradient → dark bg + teal
  3. src/components/ChatWidget.tsx — purple header → teal
  4. src/app/teaching/page.tsx — full teaching dashboard
  5. src/app/teaching/lessons/new/page.tsx — new lesson form
  6. src/components/BricksEditor.tsx — editor tree/detail panel
  7. src/app/teaching/lessons/[id]/page.tsx — lesson detail \(672 lines\)
  8. src/app/teaching/scenarios/[id]/page.tsx — scenario editor \(482 lines\)
  9. src/app/build/page.tsx — build system \(707 lines\)
- Build verified clean, committed as 9cc36a0, pushed to main
- Added dispatch.jbcloud.app domain to Vercel
- Fixed user's CNAME typo \(xcname.vercel-dns.co → cname.vercel-dns.com\)
- SSL cert provisioned by Let's Encrypt, site is live

## Theme Color Map
- bg: #0c0c0c \(base\), #161616 \(surface\), #1e1e1e \(elevated\), #252525 \(hover\)
- border: #2a2a2a \(default\), #3a3a3a \(hover\)
- text: #f5f5f5 \(primary\), #a1a1a1 \(secondary\), #666 \(muted\)
- accent: teal-500/teal-600, buttons: bg-teal-500 text-gray-950
- inputs: bg-[#1e1e1e] border-[#2a2a2a] focus:ring-teal-500/50

## Next Steps
1. Visual QA of all pages at dispatch.jbcloud.app
2. Consider Stripe billing integration
3. Clean up claude-client-portal.zip
ENDCTX)
